channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Visual Sound (old)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Visual Sound (old)

item.title: CVE-2024-8047|2024-09-17T14:29:59.767Z -- unknown -- visual%20sound%20%28old%29
item.description: The Visual Sound (old) WordPress plugin through 1.06 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack

item.description: The Visual Sound (old) WordPress plugin through 1.06 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack
